text: Sara Rue (born January 26, 1979 in New York City, New York) is an American actress. She played the roles of "Carmen Ferrara" on the drama Popular and "Claudia Casey" on the sitcom Less Than Perfect. ==Other websites== * *Sara's Bio @ abc.com Category:American television actors Category:Actors from New York City Category:1979 births Category:Living people
title: Sara Rue
